Message: The user completes the submission of the form
hello why my campign is under review

Hi there! The ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. If your campaign is still under review, it might be due to this timeframe. If your account is new, we may need some additional information for verification. Could you please provide the following details?
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once you provide this information, I can assist further.

I understand your concern. Since it's been a week, it might be due to verification issues. Please email the following details to adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification:
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, our team will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status.

Thanks for providing the information. Since you've already submitted the required details, I recommend reaching out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance. They will be able to check on the status of your account verification and provide you with an update.
Great! If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
